com.nutiteq.ui
Interface MarkerDragListener

public interface MarkerDragListener

Listener for dynamic marker drag events.

Method Summary

          Event for marker move event.
 void onDragEnd(DynamicMarker marker)
          Event for finished marker move event.
 void onDragStart(DynamicMarker marker)
          Event for marker move event initiation.
 

Method Detail

onDragStart

void onDragStart(DynamicMarker marker)
Event for marker move event initiation.

Parameters:
marker - marker that is being moved.

onDrag

boolean onDrag(DynamicMarker marker,
               MapPos pos)
Event for marker move event.

Parameters:
marker - marker that is being moved
pos - new position for the marker
Returns:
true if the position is accepted and false otherwise

onDragEnd

void onDragEnd(DynamicMarker marker)
Event for finished marker move event.

Parameters:
marker - marker that was dragged.
